title: Osmotic energy conversion with low impedance using an ultrasmall MoS2 nanosheet composite membrane
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,2519-2524
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01582C, Paper
Yuyu Su, Qi Han, Guoliang Yang, Dan Liu, Weiwei Lei
A MoS2 membrane composited with cellulose nanocrystals was investigated for osmotic energy conversion. Ultrasmall MoS2 nanosheets shorten the ion transport path and decrease the impedance of the membrane. This membrane can provide a power density of 2.3 W m−2 with a resistance of 48 kΩ.
